Let me examine our current todo status and create a comprehensive plan to complete the production platform.

Based on my analysis of the current project structure and our todo list, here's what we have remaining:

## Current Todo Status:
 **Completed:**
- Create Kubernetes deployment manifests
- Build CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions  
- Implement AI agent lifecycle tests
- Create cross-specialization integration tests

 **In Progress:**
- Build Helm charts for deployment

 **Pending:**
- Implement security hardening
- Create performance benchmarking suite
- Set up distributed tracing with Jaeger

## Production Platform Completion Plan

I can see we have excellent infrastructure in place, but need to complete the remaining critical components for full production readiness. Here's my comprehensive plan:

input.plan:
# Manifolded Production Platform Completion Plan

## Phase 1: Helm Charts for Enterprise Deployment (30 minutes)
**Objective**: Create production-ready Helm charts for simplified deployment management

### 1.1 Main Manifolded Chart Structure
- Create `helm/manifolded/` with Chart.yaml, values.yaml, and templates
- Implement templated Kubernetes manifests with configurable values
- Add dependency management for sub-charts (quantum, economic, ai, integration)
- Include environment-specific value files (dev/staging/prod)

### 1.2 Specialization Sub-Charts  
- **Quantum Engine Chart**: Templated quantum computing deployment
- **Economic Engine Chart**: High-throughput payment processing 
- **AI Consciousness Chart**: GPU-optimized AI agent management
- **Integration Services Chart**: Cross-specialization orchestration

### 1.3 Chart Features
- Auto-scaling configurations (HPA/VPA)
- Security policies and network policies
- Service mesh integration (Istio ready)
- Monitoring and observability integration
- Backup and disaster recovery configurations

## Phase 2: Security Hardening Implementation (45 minutes)
**Objective**: Implement enterprise-grade security controls and compliance frameworks

### 2.1 Pod Security Standards
- Implement Pod Security Standards (restricted profile)
- Runtime security monitoring with Falco
- Container image scanning and admission controllers
- Network segmentation with Calico/Cilium

### 2.2 Secrets Management
- HashiCorp Vault integration for dynamic secrets
- External Secrets Operator configuration
- Certificate management with cert-manager
- Key rotation automation

### 2.3 Compliance Frameworks
- NIST Cybersecurity Framework implementation
- SOC 2 Type II controls mapping
- GDPR data protection measures
- HIPAA compliance for healthcare deployments

## Phase 3: Performance Benchmarking Suite (35 minutes) 
**Objective**: Create comprehensive performance testing and optimization tools

### 3.1 Quantum Performance Tests
- Quantum key generation latency benchmarks (<1ms target)
- Quantum error correction performance validation
- Coherence time optimization testing
- Multi-qubit operation throughput analysis

### 3.2 Economic Engine Benchmarks
- Payment processing throughput (10,000+ TPS target)
- Transaction latency optimization (<50ms target) 
- Concurrent user load testing
- Database performance optimization

### 3.3 AI System Performance
- Agent response time benchmarks (<30s complex queries)
- Concurrent agent management stress tests
- GPU utilization optimization
- Learning algorithm convergence analysis

### 3.4 Cross-Specialization Benchmarks
- End-to-end workflow performance (<100ms integration latency)
- Resource utilization efficiency measurements
- System resilience under concurrent load
- Integration overhead analysis

## Phase 4: Distributed Tracing with Jaeger (25 minutes)
**Objective**: Implement comprehensive observability for complex multi-system workflows

### 4.1 Jaeger Infrastructure
- Deploy Jaeger operator and collector services
- Configure trace sampling and retention policies  
- Implement trace storage optimization (Elasticsearch/Cassandra)
- Set up Jaeger query interface and dashboards

### 4.2 Application Instrumentation
- Quantum engine tracing integration
- Economic transaction flow tracing
- AI agent operation tracking
- Cross-specialization workflow tracing

### 4.3 Observability Integration
- Correlation with Prometheus metrics
- Integration with Grafana dashboards
- Alert correlation with distributed traces
- Performance bottleneck identification

## Success Metrics & Validation

### Performance Targets
- **Quantum**: <1ms key generation, >99.9% uptime
- **Economic**: >10,000 TPS, <50ms latency  
- **AI**: <30s response time, 100+ concurrent agents
- **Integration**: <100ms cross-specialization latency

### Security Validation
- Zero critical security vulnerabilities
- All compliance frameworks validated
- Penetration testing passed
- Security audit trail complete

### Deployment Readiness
- One-command deployment via Helm
- Auto-scaling validated under load
- Disaster recovery procedures tested
- Multi-environment promotion pipeline

## Deliverables
1. **Production Helm Charts** - Enterprise deployment package
2. **Security Hardening Documentation** - Comprehensive security controls
3. **Performance Benchmark Suite** - Automated performance validation
4. **Distributed Tracing Setup** - Complete observability stack
5. **Production Deployment Guide** - End-to-end deployment instructions

This plan will complete our enterprise-grade production platform with all critical infrastructure, security, performance, and observability components needed for large-scale deployment.

apiVersion: v2
name: manifolded
description: Enterprise-grade Multi-Dimensional AI Platform with Quantum Computing and Economic Systems
type: application
version: 1.0.0
appVersion: "1.0.0"
keywords:
  - ai
  - quantum
  - economics
  - enterprise
  - multi-dimensional
home: https://manifolded.ai
sources:
  - https://github.com/manifolded/platform
maintainers:
  - name: Manifolded Team
    email: platform@manifolded.ai
    url: https://manifolded.ai
icon: https://manifolded.ai/icons/logo.svg
deprecated: false
annotations:
  category: AI/ML Platform
  licenses: AGPL-3.0
  security.compliance: "SOC2,ISO27001,GDPR,HIPAA"
  quantum.enabled: "true"
  economic.systems: "high-performance"
  ai.capabilities: "autonomous-agents"
dependencies:
  - name: postgresql
    version: 12.x.x
    repository: https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami
    condition: postgresql.enabled
    tags:
      - database
  - name: redis
    version: 17.x.x
    repository: https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami
    condition: redis.enabled
    tags:
      - cache
  - name: prometheus
    version: 15.x.x
    repository: https://prometheus-community.github.io/helm-charts
    condition: monitoring.prometheus.enabled
    tags:
      - monitoring
  - name: grafana
    version: 6.x.x
    repository: https://grafana.github.io/helm-charts
    condition: monitoring.grafana.enabled
    tags:
      - monitoring
  - name: jaeger
    version: 0.71.x
    repository: https://jaegertracing.github.io/helm-charts
    condition: tracing.jaeger.enabled
    tags:
      - tracing
  - name: vault
    version: 0.25.x
    repository: https://helm.releases.hashicorp.com
    condition: security.vault.enabled
    tags:
      - security

name: manifolded

input.content:
# Manifolded Platform Helm Chart Values
# Global configuration for the entire platform

global:
  # Container registry settings
  registry: ghcr.io
  repository: manifolded
  tag: ""  # Uses appVersion from Chart.yaml by default
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  pullSecrets: []

  # Environment settings
  environment: production  # dev, staging, production
  domain: manifolded.ai
  tlsEnabled: true
  
  # Security settings
  podSecurityPolicy:
    enabled: true
    runAsNonRoot: true
    runAsUser: 1000
    fsGroup: 1000
  
  # Networking
  serviceAccount:
    create: true
    automount: false
  
  # Resource management
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi

# Namespace configuration
namespaces:
  system: manifolded-system
  quantum: manifolded-quantum
  economic: manifolded-economic
  ai: manifolded-ai
  integration: manifolded-integration
  monitoring: manifolded-monitoring

# Quantum Engine Configuration
quantumEngine:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  image:
    repository: quantum-engine
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    hpqcEnabled: true
    maxQubits: 1024
    coherenceTimeMs: 1000
    errorCorrectionThreshold: 0.001
    maxConcurrentOperations: 100
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 4000m
      memory: 8Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 3
    maxReplicas: 20
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/quantum-enabled: "true"
  
  tolerations:
    - key: "manifolded.ai/quantum"
      operator: "Equal"
      value: "true"
      effect: "NoSchedule"

# Economic Engine Configuration  
economicEngine:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 5
  image:
    repository: economic-engine
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    targetTps: 10000
    latencyTargetMs: 10
    maxAmount: 1000000000
    feePercentage: 0.001
    quantumSignaturesRequired: true
  
  database:
    host: postgres
    port: 5432
    name: economic_db
    user: economic
    # password stored in secrets
    poolSize: 20
    maxLifetimeSeconds: 3600
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 5
    maxReplicas: 50
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
    customMetrics:
      - type: Pods
        pods:
          metric:
            name: economic_payment_queue_length
          target:
            type: AverageValue
            averageValue: "100"
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/high-performance: "true"

# AI Consciousness Configuration
aiConsciousness:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: ai-consciousness
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    websocketPort: 8081
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    maxConcurrentAgents: 100
    safetyConstraintsLevel: "enterprise"
    quantumIntegrationEnabled: true
    aiModelTimeout: 300000
  
  gpu:
    enabled: true
    count: 1
    type: "nvidia.com/gpu"
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 4000m
      memory: 16Gi
      nvidia.com/gpu: 1
    requests:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 8Gi
      nvidia.com/gpu: 1
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 2
    maxReplicas: 10
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/gpu-enabled: "true"
  
  tolerations:
    - key: "manifolded.ai/gpu"
      operator: "Equal"
      value: "true"
      effect: "NoSchedule"
    - key: "nvidia.com/gpu"
      operator: "Exists"
      effect: "NoSchedule"

# Phoenix Dashboard Configuration
phoenixDashboard:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  image:
    repository: phoenix-dashboard
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 4000
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    mixEnv: prod
    phxHost: api.manifolded.ai
    phxPort: 4000
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 3
    maxReplicas: 15
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/web-tier: "true"

# Integration Services Configuration
integrationServices:
  quantumEconomicBridge:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 3
    image:
      repository: quantum-economic-bridge
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
  
  aiEconomicIncentives:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 3
    image:
      repository: ai-economic-incentives
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
  
  quantumAiConsciousness:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 2
    image:
      repository: quantum-ai-consciousness
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
      websocketPort: 8081
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 8Gi
        nvidia.com/gpu: 1
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 4Gi
        nvidia.com/gpu: 1

# Ingress Configuration
ingress:
  enabled: true
  className: nginx
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rate-limit: "1000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rate-limit-window: "1m"
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: "letsencrypt-prod"
  
  hosts:
    - host: api.manifolded.ai
      paths:
        - path: /
          pathType: Prefix
          service: phoenix-dashboard
          port: 4000
        - path: /api/v1/quantum
          pathType: Prefix
          service: quantum-engine
          port: 8080
        - path: /api/v1/economic
          pathType: Prefix
          service: economic-engine
          port: 8080
        - path: /api/v1/ai
          pathType: Prefix
          service: ai-consciousness
          port: 8080
  
  tls:
    - secretName: manifolded-tls-secret
      hosts:
        - api.manifolded.ai

# Storage Configuration
storage:
  storageClass: manifolded-ssd
  quantum:
    size: 50Gi
  economic:
    size: 200Gi
  ai:
    models: 100Gi
    state: 50Gi
  phoenix:
    uploads: 20Gi
  monitoring:
    prometheus: 200Gi
    grafana: 10Gi
    loki: 100Gi

# Database Configuration
postgresql:
  enabled: true
  auth:
    postgresPassword: ""  # Set in secrets
    database: manifolded
  primary:
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
    persistence:
      enabled: true
      storageClass: manifolded-nvme
      size: 200Gi

# Redis Configuration
redis:
  enabled: true
  auth:
    enabled: true
    password: ""  # Set in secrets
  master:
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 1Gi
    persistence:
      enabled: true
      storageClass: manifolded-nvme
      size: 20Gi

# Monitoring Configuration
monitoring:
  enabled: true
  
  prometheus:
    enabled: true
    retention: 30d
    storage: 200Gi
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 8Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 4Gi
  
  grafana:
    enabled: true
    adminPassword: ""  # Set in secrets
    persistence:
      enabled: true
      size: 10Gi
    dashboards:
      default: true
      manifolded: true
  
  loki:
    enabled: true
    retention: 90d
    storage: 100Gi

# Tracing Configuration
tracing:
  enabled: true
  jaeger:
    enabled: true
    strategy: production
    collector:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpu: 1000m
          memory: 2Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 500m
          memory: 1Gi
    query:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpu: 500m
          memory: 1Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 250m
          memory: 512Mi
    storage:
      type: elasticsearch
      elasticsearch:
        host: elasticsearch
        port: 9200

# Security Configuration
security:
  enabled: true
  
  vault:
    enabled: true
    server:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpu: 1000m
          memory: 2Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 500m
          memory: 1Gi
      dataStorage:
        enabled: true
        size: 10Gi
        storageClass: manifolded-ssd
  
  podSecurityStandards:
    enabled: true
    enforce: restricted
    audit: restricted
    warn: restricted
  
  networkPolicies:
    enabled: true
    defaultDeny: true
  
  rbac:
    enabled: true
    
  serviceAccounts:
    quantumEngine:
      create: true
      automountToken: false
    economicEngine:
      create: true
      automountToken: false
    aiConsciousness:
      create: true
      automountToken: false
    phoenixDashboard:
      create: true
      automountToken: false

# Environment-specific overrides
environments:
  dev:
    replicaCount: 1
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 1Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 512Mi
    monitoring:
      enabled: false
    security:
      podSecurityStandards:
        enforce: baseline
    ingress:
      hosts:
        - host: dev.manifolded.ai
  
  staging:
    replicaCount: 2
    monitoring:
      enabled: true
    ingress:
      hosts:
        - host: staging.manifolded.ai
  
  production:
    # Production values are the defaults above
    monitoring:
      enabled: true
    security:
      podSecurityStandards:
        enforce: restricted
    backup:
      enabled: true
      schedule: "0 2 * * *"
      retention: "90d"

# Manifolded Platform Helm Chart Values
# Global configuration for the entire platform

global:
  # Container registry settings
  registry: ghcr.io
  repository: manifolded
  tag: ""  # Uses appVersion from Chart.yaml by default
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  pullSecrets: []

  # Environment settings
  environment: production  # dev, staging, production
  domain: manifolded.ai
  tlsEnabled: true
  
  # Security settings
  podSecurityPolicy:
    enabled: true
    runAsNonRoot: true
    runAsUser: 1000
    fsGroup: 1000
  
  # Networking
  serviceAccount:
    create: true
    automount: false
  
  # Resource management
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi

# Namespace configuration
namespaces:
  system: manifolded-system
  quantum: manifolded-quantum
  economic: manifolded-economic
  ai: manifolded-ai
  integration: manifolded-integration
  monitoring: manifolded-monitoring

# Quantum Engine Configuration
quantumEngine:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  image:
    repository: quantum-engine
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    hpqcEnabled: true
    maxQubits: 1024
    coherenceTimeMs: 1000
    errorCorrectionThreshold: 0.001
    maxConcurrentOperations: 100
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 4000m
      memory: 8Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 3
    maxReplicas: 20
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/quantum-enabled: "true"
  
  tolerations:
    - key: "manifolded.ai/quantum"
      operator: "Equal"
      value: "true"
      effect: "NoSchedule"

# Economic Engine Configuration  
economicEngine:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 5
  image:
    repository: economic-engine
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    targetTps: 10000
    latencyTargetMs: 10
    maxAmount: 1000000000
    feePercentage: 0.001
    quantumSignaturesRequired: true
  
  database:
    host: postgres
    port: 5432
    name: economic_db
    user: economic
    # password stored in secrets
    poolSize: 20
    maxLifetimeSeconds: 3600
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 4Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 5
    maxReplicas: 50
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
    customMetrics:
      - type: Pods
        pods:
          metric:
            name: economic_payment_queue_length
          target:
            type: AverageValue
            averageValue: "100"
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/high-performance: "true"

# AI Consciousness Configuration
aiConsciousness:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: ai-consciousness
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    websocketPort: 8081
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    maxConcurrentAgents: 100
    safetyConstraintsLevel: "enterprise"
    quantumIntegrationEnabled: true
    aiModelTimeout: 300000
  
  gpu:
    enabled: true
    count: 1
    type: "nvidia.com/gpu"
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 4000m
      memory: 16Gi
      nvidia.com/gpu: 1
    requests:
      cpu: 2000m
      memory: 8Gi
      nvidia.com/gpu: 1
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 2
    maxReplicas: 10
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/gpu-enabled: "true"
  
  tolerations:
    - key: "manifolded.ai/gpu"
      operator: "Equal"
      value: "true"
      effect: "NoSchedule"
    - key: "nvidia.com/gpu"
      operator: "Exists"
      effect: "NoSchedule"

# Phoenix Dashboard Configuration
phoenixDashboard:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  image:
    repository: phoenix-dashboard
    tag: ""
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 4000
    metricsPort: 9090
  
  config:
    mixEnv: prod
    phxHost: api.manifolded.ai
    phxPort: 4000
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
  
  autoscaling:
    enabled: true
    minReplicas: 3
    maxReplicas: 15
    targetCPU: 70
    targetMemory: 80
  
  nodeSelector:
    manifolded.ai/web-tier: "true"

# Integration Services Configuration
integrationServices:
  quantumEconomicBridge:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 3
    image:
      repository: quantum-economic-bridge
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
  
  aiEconomicIncentives:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 3
    image:
      repository: ai-economic-incentives
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
  
  quantumAiConsciousness:
    enabled: true
    replicaCount: 2
    image:
      repository: quantum-ai-consciousness
      tag: ""
    service:
      port: 8080
      websocketPort: 8081
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 8Gi
        nvidia.com/gpu: 1
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 4Gi
        nvidia.com/gpu: 1

# Ingress Configuration
ingress:
  enabled: true
  className: nginx
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rate-limit: "1000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rate-limit-window: "1m"
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: "letsencrypt-prod"
  
  hosts:
    - host: api.manifolded.ai
      paths:
        - path: /
          pathType: Prefix
          service: phoenix-dashboard
          port: 4000
        - path: /api/v1/quantum
          pathType: Prefix
          service: quantum-engine
          port: 8080
        - path: /api/v1/economic
          pathType: Prefix
          service: economic-engine
          port: 8080
        - path: /api/v1/ai
          pathType: Prefix
          service: ai-consciousness
          port: 8080
  
  tls:
    - secretName: manifolded-tls-secret
      hosts:
        - api.manifolded.ai

# Storage Configuration
storage:
  storageClass: manifolded-ssd
  quantum:
    size: 50Gi
  economic:
    size: 200Gi
  ai:
    models: 100Gi
    state: 50Gi
  phoenix:
    uploads: 20Gi
  monitoring:
    prometheus: 200Gi
    grafana: 10Gi
    loki: 100Gi

# Database Configuration
postgresql:
  enabled: true
  auth:
    postgresPassword: ""  # Set in secrets
    database: manifolded
  primary:
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 4Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
    persistence:
      enabled: true
      storageClass: manifolded-nvme
      size: 200Gi

# Redis Configuration
redis:
  enabled: true
  auth:
    enabled: true
    password: ""  # Set in secrets
  master:
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 2Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 1Gi
    persistence:
      enabled: true
      storageClass: manifolded-nvme
      size: 20Gi

# Monitoring Configuration
monitoring:
  enabled: true
  
  prometheus:
    enabled: true
    retention: 30d
    storage: 200Gi
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 2000m
        memory: 8Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 4Gi
  
  grafana:

    persistence:

# Tracing Configuration

        limits:
          cpu: 1000m

    query:

          cpu: 500m
          memory: 1Gi

          memory: 512Mi
    storage:
      type: elasticsearch
      elasticsearch:
        host: elasticsearch
        port: 9200

# Security Configuration
security:
  enabled: true
  
  vault:
    enabled: true
    server:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpu: 1000m
          memory: 2Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 500m
          memory: 1Gi
      dataStorage:
        enabled: true
        size: 10Gi
        storageClass: manifolded-ssd
  
  podSecurityStandards:

    economicEngine:

    aiConsciousness:

{{- if .Values.quantumEngine.enabled }}
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
    manifolded.ai/specialization: quantum
    manifolded.ai/tier: compute
spec:
  replicas: {{ include "manifolded.replicaCount" (dict "component" .Values.quantumEngine "root" .) }}
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 6 }}
      app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 8 }}
        app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
        manifolded.ai/specialization: quantum
        manifolded.ai/tier: compute
        {{- include "manifolded.monitoringLabels" (dict "specialization" "quantum" "Values" .Values) | nindent 8 }}
      annotations:
        {{- include "manifolded.annotations" (dict "metricsPort" .Values.quantumEngine.service.metricsPort) | nindent 8 }}
        checksum/config: {{ include "manifolded.quantumEngine.configChecksum" . }}
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/role: "quantum-engine"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-quantum-keys: "quantum/keys"
        {{- end }}
    spec:
      securityContext:
        {{- include "manifolded.podSecurityContext" . | nindent 8 }}
      serviceAccountName: {{ include "manifolded.quantumEngine.serviceAccountName" . }}
      {{- with .Values.global.pullSecrets }}
      imagePullSecrets:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app.kubernetes.io/component
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - quantum-engine
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      {{- with .Values.quantumEngine.nodeSelector }}
      nodeSelector:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      {{- with .Values.quantumEngine.tolerations }}
      tolerations:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      containers:
      - name: quantum-engine
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "quantum-engine" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        ports:
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.port }}
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.metricsPort }}
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: RUST_LOG
          value: "debug"
        - name: QUANTUM_CONFIG_PATH
          value: "/etc/quantum/quantum.toml"
        - name: LOG_CONFIG_PATH
          value: "/etc/quantum/logging.yaml"
        - name: METRICS_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.metricsPort }}"
        - name: SERVER_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.port }}"
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        resources:
          {{- include "manifolded.resources" (dict "component" .Values.quantumEngine "root" .) | nindent 10 }}
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          failureThreshold: 30
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /etc/quantum
          readOnly: true
        - name: logs
          mountPath: /var/log/quantum
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        - name: quantum-state
          mountPath: /var/lib/quantum
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        - name: vault-secrets
          mountPath: /vault/secrets
          readOnly: true
        {{- end }}
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine-config
          defaultMode: 0644
      - name: logs
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: quantum-state
        {{- if .Values.storage.quantum.size }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-state-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 5Gi
        {{- end }}
      {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
      - name: vault-secrets
        emptyDir: {}
      {{- end }}
{{- end }}

          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: quantum-state
        {{- if .Values.storage.quantum.size }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-state-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 5Gi
        {{- end }}
      {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
      - name: vault-secrets
        emptyDir: {}
      {{- end }}
{{- end }}

Analysis:
Analyzing this extensive conversation chronologically:

**Initial Context**: This conversation is a continuation from a previous session that ran out of context. The previous session involved integrating Katalyst React 19 dashboard into Phoenix LiveView and creating 80's/90's/100 level specialization folders for different technologies.

**Current Session Start**: User requested to continue engineering the platform using "opusplan" model, indicating they wanted me to continue with the planned tasks.

1. Helm Charts for Enterprise Deployment (30 minutes)
2. Security Hardening Implementation (45 minutes) 
3. Performance Benchmarking Suite (35 minutes)
4. Distributed Tracing with Jaeger (25 minutes)

**Plan Execution Begin**: After user approved the plan, I started implementing Phase 1 (Helm Charts) and encountered directory creation issues which I resolved by creating files directly.

**Key Technical Progress**: Successfully created comprehensive Helm chart infrastructure including Chart.yaml, values.yaml, template helpers, namespaces, and quantum-engine deployment templates.

**Current State**: Working on completing the Helm charts for deployment as part of the approved production platform completion plan.

Summary:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   - User requested to continue engineering the Manifolded platform using "opusplan" model: "/alignment Q='please keep writing the production platform and check if we're still got thing's in the todo' model='opusplan'"
   - Check and continue working through remaining tasks in the todo list

   - Maintain focus on the multi-dimensional AI platform with Quantum, Economic, and AI specializations

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - Helm Charts for Kubernetes deployment management

   - Enterprise-grade security hardening with Pod Security Standards
   - Performance benchmarking for quantum computing (sub-millisecond targets)
   - Distributed tracing with Jaeger for observability
   - Cross-specialization integration workflows
   - Kubernetes namespaces with security boundaries
   - Auto-scaling configurations (HPA/VPA)
   - HashiCorp Vault integration for secrets management
   - Production deployment with monitoring stack

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - `/home/ubuntu/src/repos/manifolded/helm/manifolded/Chart.yaml`
     - Main Helm chart definition for the Manifolded platform
     - Defines dependencies on PostgreSQL, Redis, Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger, and Vault
     - Sets version 1.0.0 and includes enterprise compliance annotations
     ```yaml
     apiVersion: v2

     description: Enterprise-grade Multi-Dimensional AI Platform with Quantum Computing and Economic Systems

     version: 1.0.0
     appVersion: "1.0.0"
     ```

   - `/home/ubuntu/src/repos/manifolded/helm/manifolded/values.yaml`
     - Comprehensive configuration values for all platform components
     - Defines resource limits, scaling parameters, and environment-specific overrides
     - Quantum Engine configuration with HPQC enabled and 1024 max qubits
     ```yaml
     quantumEngine:
       enabled: true
       replicaCount: 3
       config:
         hpqcEnabled: true
         maxQubits: 1024
         coherenceTimeMs: 1000
     ```

   - `/home/ubuntu/src/repos/manifolded/helm/manifolded/templates/_helpers.tpl`
     - Template helper functions for generating Kubernetes resource names and labels
     - Security context and resource management helpers
     - Environment-specific value override functionality

     - Templated Kubernetes deployment for quantum computing engine
     - Includes security contexts, health checks, and Vault integration
     - Configured for anti-affinity and quantum-specific node selection

   - **Directory Creation Issues**: When trying to create nested Helm directories with mkdir -p, encountered errors. Fixed by creating files directly which automatically creates the directory structure.
   - **Plan Mode Restriction**: System activated plan mode when I tried to make changes, requiring me to present a comprehensive plan before implementation. Fixed by using ExitPlanMode tool with detailed implementation plan.

   - Established proper Helm chart structure following Kubernetes best practices

content.text: Now I'll continue building the Helm charts by creating the Economic Engine deployment template. This component handles high-throughput financial transactions and requires specific security and performance configurations.

input.content:
{{- if .Values.economicEngine.enabled }}
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
    manifolded.ai/specialization: economic
    manifolded.ai/tier: core
spec:
  replicas: {{ include "manifolded.replicaCount" (dict "component" .Values.economicEngine "root" .) }}
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 25%
      maxSurge: 50%
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 6 }}
      app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 8 }}
        app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
        manifolded.ai/specialization: economic
        manifolded.ai/tier: core
        {{- include "manifolded.monitoringLabels" (dict "specialization" "economic" "Values" .Values) | nindent 8 }}
      annotations:
        {{- include "manifolded.annotations" (dict "metricsPort" .Values.economicEngine.service.metricsPort) | nindent 8 }}
        checksum/config: {{ include "manifolded.economicEngine.configChecksum" . }}
        checksum/secrets: {{ include (print $.Template.BasePath "/secrets/economic-secrets.yaml") . | sha256sum }}
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/role: "economic-engine"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-db-credentials: "economic/database"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-payment-keys: "economic/payments"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-encryption-keys: "economic/encryption"
        {{- end }}
    spec:
      securityContext:
        {{- include "manifolded.podSecurityContext" . | nindent 8 }}
      serviceAccountName: {{ include "manifolded.economicEngine.serviceAccountName" . }}
      {{- with .Values.global.pullSecrets }}
      imagePullSecrets:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app.kubernetes.io/component
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - economic-engine
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
          - weight: 50
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: manifolded.ai/specialization
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - economic
              topologyKey: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone
      {{- with .Values.economicEngine.nodeSelector }}
      nodeSelector:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      {{- with .Values.economicEngine.tolerations }}
      tolerations:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      initContainers:
      - name: db-migration
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "economic-engine" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        command:
        - /app/bin/economic_engine
        - eval
        - "EconomicEngine.Release.migrate()"
        env:
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-secrets
              key: database-url
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "prod"
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        volumeMounts:
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
      containers:
      - name: economic-engine
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "economic-engine" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        ports:
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.economicEngine.service.port }}
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.economicEngine.service.metricsPort }}
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "prod"
        - name: PHX_HOST
          value: "economic.{{ .Values.global.domain }}"
        - name: PHX_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.service.port }}"
        - name: METRICS_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.service.metricsPort }}"
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-secrets
              key: database-url
        - name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-secrets
              key: secret-key-base
        - name: ENCRYPTION_SALT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-secrets
              key: encryption-salt
        - name: TARGET_TPS
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.config.targetTps }}"
        - name: LATENCY_TARGET_MS
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.config.latencyTargetMs }}"
        - name: MAX_AMOUNT
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.config.maxAmount }}"
        - name: FEE_PERCENTAGE
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.config.feePercentage }}"
        - name: QUANTUM_SIGNATURES_REQUIRED
          value: "{{ .Values.economicEngine.config.quantumSignaturesRequired }}"
        - name: REDIS_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-secrets
              key: redis-url
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        resources:
          {{- include "manifolded.resources" (dict "component" .Values.economicEngine "root" .) | nindent 10 }}
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: economic.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 10
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/ready
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: economic.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: economic.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 60
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /app/config
          readOnly: true
        - name: logs
          mountPath: /app/logs
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        - name: uploads
          mountPath: /app/uploads
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        - name: vault-secrets
          mountPath: /vault/secrets
          readOnly: true
        {{- end }}
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-engine-config
          defaultMode: 0644
      - name: logs
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 2Gi
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: uploads
        {{- if .Values.storage.economic.size }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-uploads-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 10Gi
        {{- end }}
      {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
      - name: vault-secrets
        emptyDir: {}
      {{- end }}
{{- end }}

content.text: Now I'll create the AI Consciousness deployment template, which requires GPU resources and specialized configurations for autonomous agent management:

input.content:
{{- if .Values.aiConsciousness.enabled }}
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-consciousness
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
    manifolded.ai/specialization: ai
    manifolded.ai/tier: intelligence
spec:
  replicas: {{ include "manifolded.replicaCount" (dict "component" .Values.aiConsciousness "root" .) }}
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 6 }}
      app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 8 }}
        app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
        manifolded.ai/specialization: ai
        manifolded.ai/tier: intelligence
        {{- include "manifolded.monitoringLabels" (dict "specialization" "ai" "Values" .Values) | nindent 8 }}
      annotations:
        {{- include "manifolded.annotations" (dict "metricsPort" .Values.aiConsciousness.service.metricsPort) | nindent 8 }}
        checksum/config: {{ include "manifolded.aiConsciousness.configChecksum" . }}
        checksum/secrets: {{ include (print $.Template.BasePath "/secrets/ai-secrets.yaml") . | sha256sum }}
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/role: "ai-consciousness"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-ai-models: "ai/models"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-safety-keys: "ai/safety"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-llm-keys: "ai/llm-providers"
        {{- end }}
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "false"
    spec:
      securityContext:
        {{- include "manifolded.podSecurityContext" . | nindent 8 }}
      serviceAccountName: {{ include "manifolded.aiConsciousness.serviceAccountName" . }}
      {{- with .Values.global.pullSecrets }}
      imagePullSecrets:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app.kubernetes.io/component
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - ai-consciousness
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
        {{- if .Values.aiConsciousness.gpu.enabled }}
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: manifolded.ai/gpu-enabled
                operator: In
                values:
                - "true"
              - key: nvidia.com/gpu.present
                operator: In
                values:
                - "true"
        {{- end }}
      {{- with .Values.aiConsciousness.nodeSelector }}
      nodeSelector:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      {{- with .Values.aiConsciousness.tolerations }}
      tolerations:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      initContainers:
      - name: model-loader
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "ai-consciousness" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        command:
        - /app/bin/ai_consciousness
        - eval
        - "AiConsciousness.ModelLoader.preload_models()"
        env:
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "prod"
        - name: AI_MODELS_PATH
          value: "/var/lib/ai/models"
        - name: SAFETY_CONSTRAINTS_LEVEL
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.config.safetyConstraintsLevel }}"
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        volumeMounts:
        - name: ai-models
          mountPath: /var/lib/ai/models
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 4Gi
      containers:
      - name: ai-consciousness
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "ai-consciousness" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        ports:
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.port }}
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.websocketPort }}
          name: websocket
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.metricsPort }}
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "prod"
        - name: PHX_HOST
          value: "ai.{{ .Values.global.domain }}"
        - name: PHX_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.port }}"
        - name: PHX_WEBSOCKET_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.websocketPort }}"
        - name: METRICS_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.service.metricsPort }}"
        - name: AI_MODELS_PATH
          value: "/var/lib/ai/models"
        - name: AI_STATE_PATH
          value: "/var/lib/ai/state"
        - name: MAX_CONCURRENT_AGENTS
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.config.maxConcurrentAgents }}"
        - name: SAFETY_CONSTRAINTS_LEVEL
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.config.safetyConstraintsLevel }}"
        - name: QUANTUM_INTEGRATION_ENABLED
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.config.quantumIntegrationEnabled }}"
        - name: AI_MODEL_TIMEOUT
          value: "{{ .Values.aiConsciousness.config.aiModelTimeout }}"
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: database-url
        - name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: secret-key-base
        - name: OPENAI_API_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: openai-api-key
              optional: true
        - name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: anthropic-api-key
              optional: true
        - name: GOOGLE_AI_API_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: google-ai-api-key
              optional: true
        - name: REDIS_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-secrets
              key: redis-url
        - name: QUANTUM_ENGINE_URL
          value: "http://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine.{{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}.svc.cluster.local:8080"
        - name: ECONOMIC_ENGINE_URL
          value: "http://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-engine.{{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}.svc.cluster.local:8080"
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        {{- if .Values.aiConsciousness.gpu.enabled }}
        - name: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
          value: "0"
        - name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
          value: "all"
        - name: NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES
          value: "compute,utility"
        {{- end }}
        resources:
          {{- include "manifolded.resources" (dict "component" .Values.aiConsciousness "root" .) | nindent 10 }}
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: ai.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 15
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/ready
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: ai.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 10
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: ai.{{ .Values.global.domain }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 10
          failureThreshold: 120
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /app/config
          readOnly: true
        - name: logs
          mountPath: /app/logs
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        - name: ai-models
          mountPath: /var/lib/ai/models
        - name: ai-state
          mountPath: /var/lib/ai/state
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        - name: vault-secrets
          mountPath: /vault/secrets
          readOnly: true
        {{- end }}
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-consciousness-config
          defaultMode: 0644
      - name: logs
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 2Gi
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 2Gi
      - name: ai-models
        {{- if .Values.storage.ai.models }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-models-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 50Gi
        {{- end }}
      - name: ai-state
        {{- if .Values.storage.ai.state }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-state-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 10Gi
        {{- end }}
      {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
      - name: vault-secrets
        emptyDir: {}
      {{- end }}
{{- end }}

content.text: Now I'll create the Phoenix Dashboard deployment template, which serves as the main web interface for the platform:

input.content:
{{- if .Values.phoenixDashboard.enabled }}
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-dashboard
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
    manifolded.ai/specialization: system
    manifolded.ai/tier: frontend
spec:
  replicas: {{ include "manifolded.replicaCount" (dict "component" .Values.phoenixDashboard "root" .) }}
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 25%
      maxSurge: 50%
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 6 }}
      app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 8 }}
        app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
        manifolded.ai/specialization: system
        manifolded.ai/tier: frontend
        {{- include "manifolded.monitoringLabels" (dict "specialization" "system" "Values" .Values) | nindent 8 }}
      annotations:
        {{- include "manifolded.annotations" (dict "metricsPort" .Values.phoenixDashboard.service.metricsPort) | nindent 8 }}
        checksum/config: {{ include "manifolded.phoenixDashboard.configChecksum" . }}
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/role: "phoenix-dashboard"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-phoenix-secrets: "phoenix/secrets"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-session-keys: "phoenix/sessions"
        {{- end }}
    spec:
      securityContext:
        {{- include "manifolded.podSecurityContext" . | nindent 8 }}
      serviceAccountName: {{ include "manifolded.phoenixDashboard.serviceAccountName" . }}
      {{- with .Values.global.pullSecrets }}
      imagePullSecrets:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app.kubernetes.io/component
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - phoenix-dashboard
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
          - weight: 50
            podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: manifolded.ai/tier
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - frontend
              topologyKey: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone
      {{- with .Values.phoenixDashboard.nodeSelector }}
      nodeSelector:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      {{- with .Values.phoenixDashboard.tolerations }}
      tolerations:
        {{- toYaml . | nindent 8 }}
      {{- end }}
      initContainers:
      - name: assets-precompile
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "phoenix-dashboard" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        command:
        - /app/bin/phoenix_dashboard
        - eval
        - "PhoenixDashboard.Release.precompile_assets()"
        env:
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.mixEnv }}"
        - name: PHX_HOST
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxHost }}"
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        volumeMounts:
        - name: assets
          mountPath: /app/priv/static
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
      containers:
      - name: phoenix-dashboard
        image: {{ include "manifolded.image" (dict "component" "phoenix-dashboard" "Values" .Values) }}
        imagePullPolicy: {{ .Values.global.pullPolicy }}
        ports:
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.service.port }}
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.service.metricsPort }}
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: MIX_ENV
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.mixEnv }}"
        - name: PHX_HOST
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxHost }}"
        - name: PHX_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxPort }}"
        - name: METRICS_PORT
          value: "{{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.service.metricsPort }}"
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-secrets
              key: database-url
        - name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-secrets
              key: secret-key-base
        - name: LIVE_VIEW_SIGNING_SALT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-secrets
              key: liveview-signing-salt
        - name: GUARDIAN_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-secrets
              key: guardian-secret-key
        - name: REDIS_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-secrets
              key: redis-url
        - name: QUANTUM_ENGINE_URL
          value: "http://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine.{{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}.svc.cluster.local:8080"
        - name: ECONOMIC_ENGINE_URL
          value: "http://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-engine.{{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}.svc.cluster.local:8080"
        - name: AI_CONSCIOUSNESS_URL
          value: "http://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-consciousness.{{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}.svc.cluster.local:8080"
        - name: AI_CONSCIOUSNESS_WS_URL
          value: "ws://{{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-consciousness.{{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}.svc.cluster.local:8081"
        - name: PROMETHEUS_URL
          value: "http://prometheus.{{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}.svc.cluster.local:9090"
        - name: GRAFANA_URL
          value: "http://grafana.{{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}.svc.cluster.local:3000"
        - name: JAEGER_URL
          value: "http://jaeger-query.{{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}.svc.cluster.local:16686"
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        resources:
          {{- include "manifolded.resources" (dict "component" .Values.phoenixDashboard "root" .) | nindent 10 }}
        securityContext:
          {{- include "manifolded.securityContext" . | nindent 10 }}
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: {{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxHost }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: {{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxHost }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          failureThreshold: 3
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: {{ .Values.phoenixDashboard.config.phxHost }}
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          failureThreshold: 30
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /app/config
          readOnly: true
        - name: logs
          mountPath: /app/logs
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        - name: assets
          mountPath: /app/priv/static
          readOnly: true
        - name: uploads
          mountPath: /app/uploads
        {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
        - name: vault-secrets
          mountPath: /vault/secrets
          readOnly: true
        {{- end }}
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-dashboard-config
          defaultMode: 0644
      - name: logs
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Gi
      - name: assets
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 2Gi
      - name: uploads
        {{- if .Values.storage.phoenix.uploads }}
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-uploads-pvc
        {{- else }}
        emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 5Gi
        {{- end }}
      {{- if .Values.security.vault.enabled }}
      - name: vault-secrets
        emptyDir: {}
      {{- end }}
{{- end }}

content.text: Now I'll create the Kubernetes Services for all components. I'll start with the quantum engine service:

input.content:
{{- if .Values.quantumEngine.enabled }}
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
    manifolded.ai/specialization: quantum
    manifolded.ai/tier: compute
  annotations:
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-type: nlb
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-backend-protocol: tcp
    {{- if .Values.monitoring.enabled }}
    prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
    prometheus.io/port: "{{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.metricsPort }}"
    prometheus.io/path: "/metrics"
    {{- end }}
spec:
  type: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.type }}
  ports:
  - port: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.port }}
    targetPort: http
    protocol: TCP
    name: http
  - port: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.metricsPort }}
    targetPort: metrics
    protocol: TCP
    name: metrics
  selector:
    {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
  sessionAffinity: ClientIP
  sessionAffinityConfig:
    clientIP:
      timeoutSeconds: 10800
{{- end }}
---
{{- if and .Values.quantumEngine.enabled .Values.ingress.enabled }}
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine-headless
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
    manifolded.ai/specialization: quantum
    manifolded.ai/tier: compute
    manifolded.ai/service-type: headless
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  clusterIP: None
  ports:
  - port: {{ .Values.quantumEngine.service.port }}
    targetPort: http
    protocol: TCP
    name: http
  selector:
    {{- include "manifolded.selectorLabels" . | nindent 4 }}
    app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine

input.content:
{{- if .Values.security.podSecurityStandards.enabled }}
apiVersion: policy/v1beta1
kind: PodSecurityPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-restricted
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-level: restricted
  annotations:
    seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/allowedProfileNames: 'runtime/default'
    seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/defaultProfileName: 'runtime/default'
    apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/allowedProfileNames: 'runtime/default'
    apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/defaultProfileName: 'runtime/default'
spec:
  # Privilege escalation controls
  privileged: false
  allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  
  # Required security contexts
  requiredDropCapabilities:
    - ALL
  allowedCapabilities: []
  
  # Volume controls
  volumes:
    - 'configMap'
    - 'emptyDir'
    - 'projected'
    - 'secret'
    - 'downwardAPI'
    - 'persistentVolumeClaim'
  
  # Host controls
  hostNetwork: false
  hostIPC: false
  hostPID: false
  hostPorts: []
  
  # User and group controls
  runAsUser:

{{- if .Values.security.networkPolicies.enabled }}
# Default deny all ingress and egress policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-default-deny-all
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: default-deny
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
---
# Quantum engine network policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: quantum-engine
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
  ingress:
  # Allow ingress from Phoenix dashboard
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from Economic engine for quantum signatures
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from AI consciousness for quantum-enhanced AI
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from integration services
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.integration }}
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from monitoring
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
  egress:
  # Allow egress to DNS
  - to: []
    ports:
    - protocol: UDP
      port: 53
  # Allow egress to databases
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: postgresql
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5432
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: redis
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 6379
---
# Economic engine network policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-economic-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: economic-engine
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
  ingress:
  # Allow ingress from Phoenix dashboard
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from AI consciousness for economic incentives
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from integration services
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.integration }}
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from monitoring
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
  egress:
  # Allow egress to DNS
  - to: []
    ports:
    - protocol: UDP
      port: 53
  # Allow egress to quantum engine for signatures
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow egress to databases
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: postgresql
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5432
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: redis
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 6379
  # Allow egress to external payment APIs (HTTPS)
  - to: []
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 443
---
# AI consciousness network policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-ai-consciousness
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}
  labels:

      port: 8081
  # Allow ingress from monitoring
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:

    ports:

  egress:

  # Allow egress to quantum engine
  - to:

        matchLabels:

          app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
    ports:

    - namespaceSelector:

      podSelector:

    ports:

    - namespaceSelector:

# Phoenix dashboard network policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-phoenix-dashboard
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: phoenix-dashboard
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
  policyTypes:

  ingress:

  # Allow ingress from monitoring

---
# Monitoring namespace network policy
{{- if .Values.monitoring.enabled }}
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-monitoring
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.monitoring }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: monitoring
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
  ingress:
  # Allow ingress from all manifolded components for metrics
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: quantum
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: economic
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: ai
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: system
  # Allow ingress from ingress controller for monitoring UI
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: ingress-nginx
  egress:
  # Allow egress to DNS
  - to: []
    ports:
    - protocol: UDP
      port: 53
  # Allow egress to scrape metrics from all manifolded components
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: quantum
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: economic
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: ai
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          tier: system
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9090
{{- end }}
{{- end }}

# Default deny all ingress and egress policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-default-deny-all
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: default-deny
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
---
# Quantum engine network policy
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: {{ include "manifolded.fullname" . }}-quantum-engine
  namespace: {{ .Values.namespaces.quantum }}
  labels:
    {{- include "manifolded.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
    manifolded.ai/security-policy: quantum-engine
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: quantum-engine
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress
  ingress:
  # Allow ingress from Phoenix dashboard
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.system }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: phoenix-dashboard
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from Economic engine for quantum signatures
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.economic }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: economic-engine
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  # Allow ingress from AI consciousness for quantum-enhanced AI
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: {{ .Values.namespaces.ai }}
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/component: ai-consciousness
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080

  - from:

    ports:

  - from:
